Sarah Palin , the former Sarah Palin governor, Representative Mike Pence of Indiana, and Representative Michele Bachmann of Minnesota, already boast significant insurgent support. I don't necessarily think[ Mitt Romney ] is going to be one of those guys who goes to the Tea Party for votes the way other candidates might, said Ryan Rhodes , who is chairman of the Iowa Tea Party Patriots and has been contacted by almost every presidential hopeful except Mitt Romney .`` It doesn't really fit his style of politics.'' DALLAS-- NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell is not concerned about Michael Vick being billed as hosting a Super Bowl party because the Eagles quarterback told him it's not true. He has said that on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of a party and he had no intention of participating in that, Roger Goodell said.
